Question: In his autobiography, My American Journey, this person named several officers he served under who inspired and mentored him.
Hints: Cadet **** joined the Pershing Rifles, the ROTC fraternal organization and drill team begun by General John Pershing.
Soon after Barack Obama's 2008 election, this person began being mentioned as a possible cabinet member.
This person also serves on the Council on Foreign Relations Board of directors.
